description: Adds the specified tags to the specified load balancer. Each load balancer can have a maximum of 10 tags. Each tag consists of a key and an optional value. If a tag with the same key is already associated with the load balancer, AddTags updates its value. For more information, see Tag Your Classic Load Balancer in the Classic Load Balancers Guide.

parameters.name: LoadBalancerNames
parameters.description: The name of the load balancer. You can specify one load balancer only. (string) ---

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags. (dict) --- Information about a tag. The key of the tag. Value (string) --- The value of the tag.
